en.name: Warmth Shortens Cold Nights
en.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by {{16//20//24//28//32%}}. When using Basic ATK or Skill, restores all allies' HP by an amount equal to {{2//2.5//3//3.5//4%}} of their respective Max HP.

zh.name: 暖夜不会漫长
zh.description: 使装备者的生命上限提高{{16//20//24//28//32%}}。施放普攻或战技后，为我方全体回复等同于各自生命上限{{2//2.5//3//3.5//4%}}的生命值。
